"T:Devil Castle - Perpetual Madness":
"We have confirmed that a Devil Castle
has been summoned in Omega, near
Es-Ars Canyon.
We have also detected an unknown
powerful energy source in the vicinity.
Use the Buster Piles to destroy them ASAP.
――――――――――――――――――――
Quest ends when time limit expires. If the
enemy gauge hits 0, or your gauge is
higher at the end of the quest, you win."
"You'll be teleported soon! Your objective this time is to defeat the Es-Ars Devil Castle."
"Not only will you be fighting a Devil Castle and its forces, but also... Falz Dourumble! Please be careful!"
